Sidebar {.sidebar}
=====================================  

### **Select here !!!**

```{r global}

sel_spd <<- reactive({
  cars %>% unique(speed) 
})

renderUI({ 
  selectInput("sel_n",h5(tags$b(span("Zip Code", style="color:white")), align="center"),choices = sel_spd())
  
})
```

### Chart A



```{r}

df <<- reactive({
  data(cars)
  cars %>% filter(speed <= input$sel_n)
 
})


renderPlot({
   df() %>% plot()  
})
```
